contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|type=animal|date=December 2009}} {{Italic title}} :''For the city in Alba county, Romania, see [[Teiuş]].'' {{Taxobox |image= |image_caption = | name = ''Teius'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Teiidae]] | genus = '''''Teius''''' }} '''''Teius''''' is a [[genus]] of South American whiptail lizard that belongs to the family [[Teiidae]]. ==Classification== Listed alphabetically.<ref>[http://reptile-database.reptarium.cz/advanced_search?genus=teius&exact%5B0%5D=genus&submit=Search ''Teius''], The Reptile Database</ref> *''[[Teius oculatus]]'' (D’Orbigny & Bibron, 1837) *''[[Teius suquiensis]]'' Avila & Martori, 1991 *''[[Teius teyou]]'' (Daudin, 1802) – Four-toed Whiptail ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Teiidae]] {{Lizard-stub}}
